# Theory

## Matrices

### RGB to XYZ


```js
// RGB -> XYZ

0.4124564	0.3575761	0.1804375
0.2126729	0.7151522	0.0721750
0.0193339	0.1191920	0.9503041

// D65 -> D50
// https://www.w3.org/Graphics/Color/srgb

 1.047844353856414	0.022898981050086	-0.050206647741605
 0.029549007606644 	0.990508028941971	-0.017074711360960,
-0.009250984365223	0.015072338237051	 0.751717835079977

// Pre-multiplied RGB -> XYZ (D50)
// https://www.w3.org/Graphics/Color/srgb

0.436030342570117 0.385101860087134 0.143067806654203
0.222438466210245 0.716942745571917 0.060618777416563
0.013897440074263 0.097076381494207 0.713926257896652

```

### XYZ to RGB

```js
// D50 -> D65

 0.95554914713390	-0.02305395902611	0.06329672852418
-0.02829361588028 	 1.00991672562120	0.02104979853387
 0.01232672784443	-0.02053307447825   1.33064328220500

// XYZ -> RGB

 3.2404542 -1.5371385 -0.4985314
-0.9692660  1.8760108  0.0415560
 0.0556434 -0.2040259  1.0572252

// Pre-multiplied XYZ (D50) -> RGB

 3.133923646337800 -1.61692293927390 -0.490733723087730
-0.978421051672060  1.91584266531320  0.033399126995962
 0.072035533968592 -0.22903203517027  1.405716157677000

```
